data.title: Marriage Ministry: October Open House
data.meta_description: The Re|engage marriage ministry open house in Fresno, California, is designed to learn from practitioners and leaders about the purpose of Re|engage, how it works, and how to bring it to your church.
data.text:
Half-Day Marriage Ministry Open House

If your church is not currently running a marriage ministry, but you’d like to see if Re|engage is a good fit, join our friends at The Well Community Church in Fresno, California (see location), for a half-day ministry introduction.

At this Open House event, you will have two hours to learn from their leaders about the purpose of Re|engage, how it works, and how to bring it to your church. Immediately after, you’ll participate in an actual Re|engage ministry night and see it in action. Ticket prices include a copy of the curriculum and a meal.

Re|engage Marriage Ministry Fresno, CA Open House Schedule

2:30PM - Registration

3:00PM - Session 1 (Why Re|engage?)

4:15PM - Session 2 (What is Re|engage?)

5:30PM - Leader Meeting + Dinner

6:30PM - Large Group

7:15PM - Q&A

Note: Although churches already running Re|engage are welcome to attend, this is an introduction to the basics of the ministry and is intended for churches not offering Re|engage.

Childcare services are unavailable at the open house.

Learn more about Re|engage.
